title: I am not able to stream HD content on Amazon Prime Video on my Pixel 4A and green tint issue
content: My Pixel 4A is not supporting HD content on Amazon Prime Video despite having Widevine L1 support. And also there is some tinting issue at low brightness (green tint) on a grey background like of google chrome. The colors also appear somewhat warm on my Pixel 4A despite the night light being turned off.
